productname: 4Trade 5L Pressure Sprayer with Mannometer
productdescription: 5L Pressure Sprayer is designed to be used with sprayable timbercare

productname: Cuprinol Decking Oil 5L Natural
productdescription: Cuprinol UV Guard Decking Oil can be used to penetrate into wood to replace natural oils and resins lost through weathering. Its tinted formula revitalises the colour of weathered wood.

productname: Cuprinol Wood Preserver 5L Clear
productdescription: A colourless general-purpose preserver for interior or exterior use. It gives deep penetrating protection to sound wood against decay, mould and blue-staining fungi. It has also been developed with a low odour formula to make it more pleasant and convenient to use.

productname: Cuprinol 5 Star Complete Wood Treatment 5L
productdescription: A clear, low odour, water based, all purpose treatment, to prevent insect attack, re-infestation and protect from fungal decay. Also protects against wet rot, dry rot and woodworm. Coverage rate of 3.5 to 5m2 per litre (typically requires 2-3 uniform coats).

productname: Cuprinol Woodworm Killer Water-Based 5L
productdescription: A clear water-based low odour formulation that kills all types of woodworm. Its deep penetration prevents re-infestation and ensures effective protection for years to come. Do not use on beehives or bee keeping equipment.

productname: Deck-Tite Green Deck Screw 50mm Qty 500
productdescription: Deck-Tite's unique thread pitch to core size ratio offers the perfect balance between ease of insertion and pull-out retention whilst increasing the core's sheer strength to match the thread pitch.  It is a tri-lock thread which forms, not cuts, a thread in the material, expanding the wood around the screw, ensuring a tight and secure fix. This thread is formed by forming a thread in the material, not cutting it. There will be no movement of the screw once it has been driven in.

productname: SPAX T-Star Wirox coated Decking Screw 4.5 x 60mm Qty 250
productdescription:
Deck screws from SPAX will provide a strong, firm grip on wooden decks. Easily countersunk into timber, the cylindrical head reduces splitting.
Through 4CUT, SPAX eliminates predrilling, ensuring a fast and secure fastening.  The T-STAR Plus head's square end pushes wood fibre aside, reducing screw-in torque.

productname: Flexseal SC120 Standard Coupling 105-120
productdescription: Shear banded couplings are a requirement of the UK water companies when connecting onto their assets. This requirement forms part of Water Industry Specification (WIS) 4-41-01, which outlines the requirements to connect pipes on adopted systems using only shear banded couplings. The shear band gives the connection added protection against shear loads that could cause the pipes to become mis-aligned.

productdescription:
A direct replacement for traditional restraint straps, the innovative design of these lightweight straps allows ease of handling and installation whilst maintaining the structural strength and robustness of much heavier weight types.
The HES (heavy engineered strap) replace the traditional heavy (30 x 5mm) restraint straps in roof and floor construction.
Reduced thickness allows the HES strap to span the bottom chords of trusses and over floor joists without the need for notching.
HES straps are less than 40% of the weight, quicker to fit, and overcome many fixing problems associated with traditional heavy straps.

productname: Rockwool Sound Insulation Slab 1200 x 400 x 100mm (2.88m2)
productdescription:
Designed for use in separating internal walls and floors, ROCKWOOL Sound Insulation Slab reduces noise from adjacent properties and between rooms in the same homes, as well as providing exceptional fire resistance.
Made from stone, ROCKWOOL insulation absorbs sound and reduces sound vibrations due to its density, non-directional fibre orientation and its open porus structure; trapping and preventing sound waves from travelling through it.
ROCKWOOL insulation is non-combustable, and able to withstand temperatures up to 1,000 degrees centergrade. ROCKWOOL insulation acts like a fire barrier, improving the safety of occupants and protecting property and contents in the event of a fire.

The higher density core design of this board enables the wall, partition and ceiling systems to provide greater sound insulating performance levels over standard products by reducing the transmission of sound between rooms.

productname: British Gypsum Gyproc WallBoard DUPLEX Tapered Edge 2400mm x 1200mm x 12.5mm
productdescription:
Gyproc WallBoard DUPLEX, backed with a vapour controlled membrane, is a high-quality and durable product. This wallboard features an aerated Gypsum centre, secured by bonded paper liners and polyester film.
With an Ivory-faced paper and metallised polyester film reverse, it can be used for wall and ceiling linings where vapour control and plasterboard lining are required in one fixing operation.
Gyproc WallBoard DUPLEX is a plasterboard that is suitable for dry lining internal surfaces.

productname: Wedi Building Board 2500mm x 625mm x 12.5mm BA12.5
productdescription: wedi Building Board 2500 x 625 x 12.5mm is ideally suited for creating flush transitions to plasterboard.

productname: British Gypsum Thistle MultiFinish Coat Plaster 25kg

productname: British Gypsum Gyproc General Purpose Drywall Plasterboard Adhesive 25kg

productname: British Gypsum Thistle BondingCoat Plaster 25kg
productdescription: The thistle bonding coat from British Gypsum is an undercoat plaster ideal for smooth and low suction backgrounds, including medium density blocks, dense blocks, plasterboard, painted or tiled surfaces and more. productname: British Gypsum Gyproc Easi-Fill 60 Two Coat Joint Filler Compound 10kg
productdescription: The Gyproc Easi-Fill joint filler is easy to mix and apply, providing a consistently smooth finish. It creates a lightweight product that can be beneficial for those quick fix jobs.

productname: Sika 1 Integral Liquid Waterproofer 5L
productdescription: Sika®-1 Waterproofer is an aqueous solution containing complex colloidal silicates. In the presence of water these swell and block the capillaries and pores in the applied sand/cement renders, screeds and mortar to provide an effective barrier against the transmission of liquid water.

productname: Sika Maxmix Cement Colour Red 1L
productdescription: Sika MaxMix Colour is a concentrated solution of pigments, suitable for brick laying, paving, renders, grouts and screeds. 1 litre treats up to 400kg of mortar.

productname: Sika Maxmix Concentrated Plasticiser 1L
productdescription: Sika MaxMix Plasticiser is a liquid air entraining agent for brick laying mortars, renders, pointing and screeds. It can be used in all situations where improved workability is required.

productname: Sika 2 Waterplug Leak Sealing Admixture 5L
productdescription: Sika®-2 Water Plug is a ready to use very rapid setting leak stopping liquid which is mixed with ordinary portland cement to produce a paste for immediate leak sealing against high water pressure infiltration.

productname: Cementone Plasterers Stabilising Primer 10L
productdescription: Primes and stabilises problem surfaces on previously plastered walls

productname: Eazymix Halftime Plaster Accelerator
productdescription: Reduce the setting time of all types of finishing plaster by up to 60 minutes.

productname: Cementone Concrete Mould Oil 5L
productdescription: Cementone Concrete Mould Oil is a water in oil release agent formulated for application onto timber or metal formwork

productname: Sika Maxmix Cement Colour Brown 1L
productdescription: Sika MaxMix Colour is a concentrated solution of pigments, suitable for brick laying, paving, renders, grouts and screeds. 1 litre treats up to 400kg of mortar.

productname: Sika Wintermix 5LTR
productdescription: Sika Wintermix Admixture is an air entraining, chloride free, liquid admixture for mortar and concrete which also acts as an accelerator for work in sub - zero temperatures, with increased frost resistance during setting. Sika Wintermix improves workability, even in cold weather as well as freeze/thaw resistance in bricklaying mortars, thus eliminating the need for a separate frost proofer. Sika Wintermix can be used as an air entraining, water reducing, admixture and accelerator/frost proofer for brick and block laying mortar, render (internal and external) and concrete Sika Wintermix is also suitable for load bearing brickwork, block laying, external and internal rendering, pointing/repointing brickwork and floor screeds. Due to the embedded metal, Sika Wintermix is non-corrosive to embedded metal and can also replace Lime in the mix, reducing the possibility of lime bloom and efflorescence. Sika Wintermix also benefits from reduced shrinkage, with in turn reduces cracking and crazing.

productname: Setcrete Latex Floor Levelling Compound 20kg T0603E5A
productdescription: Setcrete™ Latex is a floor levelling compound for use in light to medium traffic internal areas prior to the installation of new floorcoverings. It is suitable for use over a wide range of absorbent and non-absorbent subfloor types providing they are sound, well adhered, and suitably prepared.

productname: Setcrete Deep Base Floor Levelling Compound 20kg 346361
productdescription: A high strength, high performance floor levelling compound that is designed to raise floor levels and to smooth uneven floors in conservatories and extensions.

productname: Ardex A46 5kg
productdescription: Multi-Purpose Cementitious Repair Mortar

productname: Setcrete Universal Floor Levelling Compound 20kg T0601E5A

productname: TDP 20mm Fibres for Screed and Concrete 900g

productname: Liquid Science Viscosan Toilet Descaler and Cleaner 1 Litre
productdescription: A concentrated, perfumed, thick toilet cleaner and descaler which quickly removes scale and organic stains from urinals and bowls and pleasant to use

productname: Arctic Blow Pipe Spray Duster 120ml ZE29

productname: Liquid Science CLEAR-A-DRAIN 1 Litre
productdescription: A radical chemical blend containing a sophisticated mixture of alkaline materials and wetting agents to attack varied types of blockages whether caused by hair, grease, fat, oils, etc.. Heavier than water the unique formula holds the active chemicals together, allowing them to sink to the source of the problem with minimum loss of activity.

productname: Blue Circle Mastercrete Grey Cement in Plastic Bag 25kg
productdescription: Mastercrete contains cement quality improver to give the following benefits compared with ordinary Portland cement: lower water demand, more cohesive mix, less tendency for water to segregate and bleed and enhanced resistance of hardened concrete or mortar to freeze/thaw attack. Mastercrete is also 39% better for the environment. Comes in a convenient weatherproof plastic bag.

productname: Blue Circle General Purpose Grey Cement in Paper Bag 25kg
productdescription: This cement bag from Blue Circle provides a multi-purpose cement suitable for a wide range of standard uses, including concrete, mortar, rendering and screeds. It is compatible with a wide range of admixtures such as air-entraining agents, workability aids and pigments.

productname: Blue Circle Snowcrete White Cement 25kg
productdescription: Snowcrete is a white cement and is used for architectural uses, providing attractive and durable concrete, rendering and mortar. Uses include cast stone, architectural precast concrete, paving slabs, street furniture and terrazzo. Snowcrete on the UK Mainland is a High Strength CEM I 52,5R. Note to produce a white finish you must also use a white sand and/or aggregate

productname: Blue Circle Hydralime Hydrated Lime 25kg
productdescription: Hydralime may be used with Procem, Mastercrete, General Purpose Cement, Snowcrete and Sulfacrete. Hydralime improves the cohesion, workability, plasticity and long term durability of Mortars and Renders when used. Note that as Hydralime is non-hydraulic, it is not suitable for use in mortars and renders without a Portland cement.

productname: Blue Circle Quality Assured Ready to Use Mortar 20kg
productdescription: Pre-mixed and ready to use with the addition of clean water, M4 (designation III) 1:1:6 cement:hydrated lime:sand mortar. Comprising specially graded sand, lime and admixtures this Blue Circle mortar offers convenience, with no compromise in performance or quality. Weather resistant and durable, this mortar is suitable for most general brick and block applications. Also ideal for pointing or gable ends. The mix is highly workable and cohesive, with a long board life.

productname: Cementone Rapid Set Cement 2.5kg
productdescription: Bostik Rapid Setting Cement is a versatile product that is ideal for a variety of interior and exterior installation, repair, and maintenance projects. productname: Era 262-32 British Standard 5 Lever Fortress Sashlock Brass 64mm
productdescription: The Fortress 5 Lever British Standard (BS) Deadbolt Mortice Door Lock is a high security Sashlock, conforming to the BS 3621:2007; meets the exacting demands of insurance companies and the Police. Higher security and strength are delivered by a 20mm bolt throw in every lock. Designed with hardened steel plates to resist drilling and two hardened steel plates in the deadbolt to resist hacksawing. Features a latch bolt, which can easily be reversed without the removal of the lock cover or screws. The keys have 1.000 variations for added security. All steel levers have false notching to resist lock picking.

productname: ERA 5 Pin Replacement Cylinder
productdescription: ERA Replacement cylinder suitable for all ERA Nightlatch Door Lock models as well as other makes of Nightlatch, 5 pin Cylinder supplied with 3 cut Keys.

productname: ERA 1830-35-1 British Standard High Security Nightlatch Satin Chrome 40mm
productdescription: The British Standard High Security Nightlatch Door Lock is a high security door lock with a classic and robust design. Ideal product to replace most existing front door locks and is ideally suited for panelled doors. Particularly suitable for glass panelled doors, as the ergonomic internal locking handle, which can be deadlocked by an anti-clockwise turn of the key from the inside, offers additional security against forced entry. The main bolt is "automatically" deadlocked into the striker, when the door is closed, preventing it from being retracted by a credit card. Designed with a 20mm bolt throw for even greater security and strength. A simple snib button enables the latch to be held in the withdrawn position (only), allowing the door to be accessible without operating the handle. The British Standard Nightlatch is a face fitted, non handed design enabling both left and right handed operation; and the striker is designed with a 3 hole fixing for additional strength and security. The lock conforms to British Standard 3621:2007 (BS EN 12209) and meets the tough criteria/requirements laid down by insurance companies and the police. Suitable for inward opening interior and exterior timber doors only. The external cylinder features a high security integral cylinder pull, which protects the cylinder from being drilled. The cylinder has over 30.000 cut key variations and is supplied with 3 cut keys. All finishes meet the requirements of BS EN 1670:2007 Grade 3 (96 hours) for Corrosion Resistance to provide the most robust finish for your hardware.

productdescription:

You can choose over 5,000 codes to provide greater security and are suitable for internal and external application. productname: Ulti-Mate® Stick-Fit® Wood Screws Trade Assortment Qty 1000
productdescription:
These high-performance Ulti-Mate® wood screws are built for strength. Featuring a patented PSD® drive system to enable smooth, stable driving and Stick-Fit® one-handed installation, this trade pack includes 1,000 screws in five sizes from 25-70mm.
A thick core diameter ensures superior strength throughout the body of the screw, and also under the head area. With a sharp point and prominent thread at the tip, you’ll get a rapid start and immediate thread engagement – this saves time and effort, helping you drive more screws per charge if using a cordless tool.
A slotted shank reduces wood splitting, and a countersunk head complete with ribs ensures a flush finish. Screws 40mm and shorter don’t have the ribs, to make them hinge-compatible. As well as five popular sizes, the pack also includes five Stick-Fit® driver bits. A high-quality Stick-Fit driver bit is included in every single box of Ulti-Mate Wood Screws. The screws also feature a type-17 point to drive through the hardest timber, a double-angle countersunk head for a neat finish and a wide, deep single thread for rapid insertion and strong holding power.

productname: ForgeFix Screw Assortment & Case 1500pc

productdescription: The Forgefix 5.0 x 100mm multi-purpose woodscrews feature countersunk heads with zinc yellow passivation for extra durability. This screw can be used in a wide variety of ironmongery, joinery, electrical, and plumbing applications.

productname: Deck-Tite Green Deck Screw 50mm Qty 500
productdescription: Deck-Tite's unique thread pitch to core size ratio offers the perfect balance between ease of insertion and pull-out retention whilst increasing the core's sheer strength to match the thread pitch.  It is a tri-lock thread which forms, not cuts, a thread in the material, expanding the wood around the screw, ensuring a tight and secure fix. This thread is formed by forming a thread in the material, not cutting it. There will be no movement of the screw once it has been driven in.

Once driven in the screw will not move, it is secure for good - no stubbed toes!

This white, rapid-setting wall and floor tile adhesive is formulated for fast track installation and enables tiles to be grouted in approximately 2 to 3 hours after fixing, depending on conditions. It provides excellent grip and adhesion.

Bostik Vitri-Flex tile adhesive is suitable for most interior and exterior installations including more demanding installations, such as use with underfloor heating and areas subject to limited vibration. When fully cured the adhesive is suitable for permanently wet areas such as showers. It will bond to concrete, plaster, sand/cement render and screeds, blockwork, brickwork, glazed surfaces, vinyl tiles, plywood overlay and more.

One of Bostik's best adhesives for vitrified tiles. Available in a 20kg bag.

productname: Evo-Stick 30812633 Waterproof Wall Tile Adhesive 10L Natural
productdescription:
Evo-Stick Waterproof Wall Tile Adhesive is a ready-mixed, mould-resistant, waterproof tile adhesive suitable for fixing ceramic wall tiles to most types of sound, and interior surfaces.

As the adhesive is waterproof, it is ideal for use in areas subject to infrequent wetting and condensation, such as kitchen and bathroom walls. This showerproof wall tile adhesive can also be applied directly onto existing tiles for convenience.

Suitable materials: Suitable for fixing onto most internal surfaces including plaster, plasterboard, glazed tiles, brick, cement, cement renders, and tile backer boards.

Suitable tiles: For fixing ceramic wall tiles.

Available as a 10L waterproof wall tile adhesive. The adhesive is supplied in a post-consumer recycled (PCR) bucket to reduce the impact of the product on the environment.

productname: Keraflex Maxi 943297 Grey 20kg Versatile Adhesive
productdescription: Keraflex Maxi S1 is a versatile adhesive able to hold large format tiles (e.g. 600 x 600 mm) on walls without slipping. Bed thickness up to 15 mm permits the installation of un-calibrated stone on floors (provided the stone is not sensitive to moisture).

productname: Evo-Stick 30812629 Instant Grab Wall Tile Adhesive 10L Natural
productdescription:

The instant tile adhesive is easy to use and can be used to tile onto most substrates, including existing tiles. 

Suitable materials: For fixing onto most internal surfaces including plaster, plasterboard, glazed tiles, brick, cement, cement renders, and tile backer boards.

Suitable tiles: Ceramic wall tiles

Available as a 10L instant grab tile adhesive. The adhesive is supplied in a post-consumer recycled (PCR) bucket to reduce the product's impact on the environment.

productname: Hansgrohe Rebris S Single lever basin mixer 110 CoolStart with pop-up waste set -  Chrome - 72519000
productdescription:
Quality that suits your style: Rebris S basin tap with CoolStart function and pop-up waste
With its timeless, sleek design, the Rebris S 110 CoolStart basin tap with pop-up waste will visibly enhance your bathroom. The sleek, rounded shapes and precision surfaces create an atmosphere of well-being. Rebris S includes modern designer taps at a fair price. Make your own dream bathroom a reality.
The renowned hansgrohe quality brings the promises of a winning design to life: A high-quality ceramic mixer system controls the water volume and temperature. This keeps working smoothly and reliably even after frequent use. Want to save water and energy? Yes, totally automatically: when the handle is in the centre position, only cold water flows. Hot water will only run if it is turned to the left (CoolStart). The flow rate is limited to max. 5 l/min even at high water pressure (EcoSmart). For a full water jet, the single lever tap enriches the water with air (AirPower). This creates a soft jet that sprays less â€“ meet the beauty of water.
Practical functions for greater convenience
A pop-up waste set is included. It allows the waste plug to be easily controlled using one hand. The tap is even suitable for hard water. The aerator can be removed for cleaning and descaled using a coin. No tools needed. This keeps the tap looking like new.


Temperature limitation can be set during installation to protect against water that is too hot
Easy installation: Flexible connection hoses make installation easier (size: DN15)
Suitable for continuous flow water heaters and therefore versatile use
Guaranteed availability: Spare parts are available for up to 15 years after the range has been discontinued

productname: Jsp EVO2 Vented Helmet Yellow
productdescription: The EVO2® Comfort Plus™ helmet combines a super strong shell for superior all day protection in the widest range of environments, with the comfort benefits of the new Evolution® 3D Adjustment™ harness system. EVO2® is a true evolution of the long established MK2® and Mk3® helmets, which were first launched in the 1970’s, the EVO2® retains the JSP signature styling while incorporating developments first seen in the EVO®8. Packed full of the latest protection technology and features such as the Evolution® 3D Adjustment™ harness system, Revolution® Wheel Ratchet or the unique OneTouch™ Slip Ratchet, which can be adjusted using one hand in a single swift movement.

productname: Makita GA9020KD 230mm Angle Grinder with Diamond Blade 240V

productname: Makita DGA452Z Lxt Angle Grinder Body Only 18V 115mm

productname: Grabo Slender Foam Seal GRAB107
productdescription:
The GRABO Slender Seal is the perfect accessory for your Grabo, allowing you to lift thinner and longer materials with ease and comfort. The unique design of the GRABO Slender Seal means it’s even easier to grab surfaces with extended, narrow surface areas, such as pavers, long tiles, pipes, cut-to-size bench tops, curb stones, and more.

The Slender Seal is interchangeable with your standard GRABO seal, and swapping between the two is a breeze!

productname: Grabo Rockseal Foam Seal GRAB109
productdescription: The RockSeal is made from durable, extra-thick foam, allowing it to form a strong seal around uneven material. RockSeal is compatible with all GRABO models and can be swapped from the standard GRABO seal in seconds.

productname: STANLEY FATMAX TradeLift
productdescription: The STANLEY FATMAX TradeLift is a versatile handheld tool for lifting, levelling, holding and spreading of heavy or awkward objects such as appliances, sheet materials or furniture ï¿½ a real life saver when you're working alone. Engineered for safety, this professional, heavy-duty tool enables easy hands-free lifting up to 150kg, to a maximum height of 220mm. The TradeLiftï¿½ is perfect for jobs like hanging doors, installing kitchen cabinets and appliances and fitting windows in all environments, with enclosed metal plate housing to enhance durability and prevent dust entering the tool. The robust lifting tool can be operated by hand or foot, with an ergonomic overmoulded handle providing extra grip, comfort, and control. A fine adjuster lowers the load by up to 2.5mm per toggle for precision levelling and spacing, with a full release button safely recessed to avoid accidental activation. The large base plate with angled edge slides easily under low objects and reduces the risk of tipping, with four screwholes countersunk into the base to anchor the lift for maximum stability.

productname: DeWalt 18V XR Li-ion Cordless Jigsaw - Body Only DCS331N-XJ
productdescription: The DeWalt 18V XR Li-ion Jigsaw is part of the intelligent XR lithium-ion platform designed for efficiency and making applications faster. The powerful and highly efficient fan cooled motor with replaceable brushes, delivers up to 3000 strokes per minute, making cutting applications faster. The 3 sided pendulum action feature controls the aggressiveness and smoothness of cuts.

productname: Stanley Junior Sawhorse Twin Pack
productdescription: Sawhorse Twin Pack - maximum load 170kg

productname: V-TUF 240V M Class Mini Dust Extraction Vaccum Cleaner
productdescription: The V-TÜF M CLASS MINI helps you tackle dust at the source. Connect it directly to your power tools or sweep up and enjoy a dust-free environment. The V-TÜF®M CLASS MINI is M-Class Rated, the ‘Minimum Requirement’ for construction sites. Unrated vacuum cleaners are extremely dangerous as respirable dust can pass through the motor and be pumped back into the air. This dust then remains airborne for up to 8 hours, where it can be inhaled directly into your lung chamber, where it will remain forever. Approximately 700 people in the UK die every year due to illness relating to the inhalation of respirable dust. Needless to say, this dust also damages your vacuum motor. The V-TÜF®M CLASS MINI offers you affordable compliance and protection from common dust-related health issues! The new M CLASS MINI is a keystone that helps V-TUF achieve its mission: To save and improve the lives of those in their line of duty. Ideal for: Construction & woodworking Industries. No reason to not embrace the M Class protection.

productname: Makita 18V LXT Brushless Impact Driver Body Only DTD153Z
productdescription: Makita is the leading manufacturer of professional power tools on the market. productname: DeWalt Thin Metal Cutting Discs 115 x 1.0 x 22.2mm
productdescription:
These DeWalt thin discs make cutting metal a walk in the park. They can be used for general grinding and cutting of stainless steel, ferrous and non-ferrous metals. They're also supplied in a pack of 10 so you should have plenty extra for when you need them.
Made with aluminium oxide grains and a reinforced fibreglass backing, these discs ensure long-lasting durability. The versatility of the thin discs also allows you to cut metals for welding and surface preparation. They can be used with both corded and cordless angle grinders, making them suitable for whatever tool you have.
The 1 mm thickness of the disc allows you to achieve fast results while maintaining enough strength for neat and straight cutting. Plus, they're packaged in a durable metal box, so you can store them away without having to worry about them getting damaged.

productname: Stanley FatMax Pro Tape 5m (16')
productdescription: The STANLEY® FATMAX® Xtreme™ 5M/16' Tape Measure, with 32mm blade width for clear and legible markings, is class II accurate, providing a reassuring +/-0,5mm error tolerance at 1m, suitable for the majority of professionals. Its abrasion resistant polyester film coated blade coating provides up to 10 times more resistance to abrasion than a standard lacquered blade, with additional BladeArmor™ coating, reinforcing the first 7.5cm of the blade, the section most vulnerable to wear. The tape measure features a 32mm blade width and an impressive reach of 4.9 metres The TRU-ZERO™ hook helps to achieve precise inner and outer measurements, moving back and forth along the securing rivets. Highly polished chrome case with rubber grip to ensure slip resistant hold to withstand heavy use on the jobsite. The tape comes with a large, protruding oversized multi-catch hook, significantly larger than a conventional hook and protruding on all edges - shaped to hook onto building materials with ease above, below and to either side. The bright yellow STANLEY blade ensures enhanced visibility in most jobsite conditions.

productname: ToughBuilt® Scraper Utility Knife
productdescription: The ToughBuilt® Scraper Utility Knife is an innovative 2-in-1 tool expertly crafted from pro-grade materials. It features a patented mechanism that allows you to transform it from a utility knife to a scraper with a simple press of your thumb. It includes five custom, Universal ToughBuilt Blades that are easily changed with the push of a button, and which are compatible with almost all other utility knives. It does everything a scraper and utility knife does, all in one tool. In scraper-mode you can remove paint, putty, labels and adhesive from windows, mirrors, tile. In knife-mode you can cut carpet, cardboard, plastic, vinyl, rope and more with ease and precision. The rugged, non-slip rubber handle is strong, durable and easy to hold, and the finger-guard ridge helps keep you safe while cutting. It also includes an integrated paint-can opener and a handy lanyard-opening for easy tethering.

productname: Stanley Instant Change Retractable Blade Knife

Incorporating an Interlock Nose that keeps the blade securely and firmly in place and new air holes in the back pad grip for an improved grip and added comfort. There is also a convenient cutting notch to allow string or twine to be cut without extending the blade. This retractable knife holds up to 8 regular duty utility blades and has an easy to operate function for changing your blades quickly and safely.

productname: Irwin IRW10504314 Multi Purpose Aviation Snips 325mm
productdescription: Extra long aviation snips with precision formed blades for a longer cutting life. Ergonomically designed over-moulded softgrips provide the perfect balance of comfort and performance, and the long-life torsion spring makes for a smooth and consistent cut. Designed for numerous applications when a long cut in lightweight material is desired.

productname: Stanley FatMax Folding Fixed Blade Knife
productdescription: The Stanley FatMax Fixed Blade Folding Knife has an ergonomic design for comfortable, extended heavy-duty use. Its soft hand grip and thumb pad ensure comfort and control, whilst its belt clip enables convenient knife transport. The knife has a metal body for added durability. It has a in-built tape cutter for opening boxes without damaging the contents. The knife has a quick blade change mechanism and on board blade storage for convenient and quick blade replacement.

productname: ToughBuilt® Reload Utility Knife + 2 Blade Mags
productdescription: The ToughBuilt® Reload Utility Knife is an innovative quick-change tool expertly crafted from professional-grade materials with a groundbreaking, patented mechanism that accepts spring-loaded blade magazines and autoloads a fresh blade with the flick of a switch. Replacing worn blades is safe and easy with a blade release button that removes used blades before loading a new one by simply pulling the actuator back and flicking it forward again. With a simple press of the magazine release, a positive, spring-loaded magazine ejector drops the magazine away from the tool or into an open hand. A new magazine can then be loaded inside, making it easy to switch from one type of blade to another in a flash. All Toughbuilt mags have an indicator switch. Positions 1, 2 or 3 remind the Pro what type of blade is loaded in a magazine without having to remove the magazine from a pouch or pocket. The Reload Knife is quality constructed from smooth aluminum alloy and zinc alloy for corrosion resistance. It is wrapped in a rugged, grippy, non-slip soft-touch rubber housing to protect the tool from shocks and drops while creating a more dexterous hand purchase on the instrument. The finger guard helps keep pros safe while cutting tough materials. It includes a five-pack of ToughBuilt universal straight-edge blades and a five-pack of ToughBuilt specialized hook blades that use a smart, precision-milled, proprietary edge design. The straight edge blades work interchangeably with the Reload Knife and the ToughBuilt Scraper Utility Knife or any standard utility knife.

productdescription: With a 25cm height adjustability on both sides, this versatile work platform is ideal for professionals needing to work on uneven surfaces and along stairways. The Adjustable PRO work platform can be configured to 10 different height positions accommodating a variety of requirements for most jobs and the compact, lightweight aluminium design provides users with a large work surface that is easy to carry and manoeuvre on the job.

productname: Werner 79025 Hop Up Platform 510mm
productdescription: The 79025 Pro Work Platform has a large work surface and is ideal for all types of jobs around the worksite. The Easy-Grab handle allows you to transport the platform in one hand while holding supplies in the other. The slim fold dual locking legs securely lock when the legs are open for safety and lock again when closed. This work platform folds completely flat when closed for easy transportation and storage.

productname: Werner 8703220 Telescopic Extension Ladder 3.2m
productdescription: The 3.2m telescopic extension ladder with stabiliser is easily portable and has a closed length of 1.02m, extending to a length of 3.22m. This adjustable ladder has smaller folded size than standard extension ladders which makes it easy to store, transport, and carry. Other features include extra rung spacing to prevent finger trapping, single handed unlocking system for easy closure, and automatic locking system for security. Approved to the latest EN131 standard - for Professional use.

productname: Werner 7140818 Stepladder 8 Tread Mastertrade
productdescription: The Werner 714 Series 8 tread MasterTrade stepladder is the traditional ladder for builders engineered using high grade aluminium box section stiles and heavy gauge plastic edge caps for a smoother profile. With heavy duty internal spreaders, rear frame cross tubes and large slip-resistant feet, this ladder is exceptional robust and built to last. Approved to the latest EN131 standard. For Professional Use.

productname: Werner 7170818 Fibreglass Platform Stepladder Trade 8 Tread
productdescription: The 717Series 8 tread platform stepladder is constructed using extremely durable, non conductive, seven-layer fibreglass rails that are highly resistant to weathering. A platform height of 1.87m enables a safe working height of 3.62m* so this ladder is ideal for any job around the worksite. The 7170818 ladder features a multi-functional HolsterTopï¿½ to keep tools organised and limit trips up and down the ladder and is ideal for working around electricity. Other features include slip-resistant steps for comfortable standing and EDGE bracing to help prevent rail damage.

productname: Werner 31334000 Easiway Loft Ladder
productdescription: The 31334000 3 section Easiway sliding aluminium loft ladder with compact sections, ideal in restricted spaces. This loft ladder is easy to use and smooth to glide when lowering or stowing the ladder. Features include a handrail and unique shoot bolt fastening for safety and ease of use. Suitable for heights up to 3m.

productname: Werner 34535000 Eco S Line Loft Ladder
productdescription: The Eco S Line 3 section loft ladder comes as a complete kit required to provide access to the loft easily and safely. With an insulated draught-proof hatch door and a handrail, this space-saving loft ladder is stored within the trapdoor so no loft floor space is used. Suitable for heights up to 2.85m.

productname: FrogTape® MULTI-SURFACE Green Masking Tape - 36mm x 41.1m
productdescription: FrogTape® for Gloss & Satin painter’s tape features medium adhesion, and will remove cleanly from most surfaces for up to 21 days and seven days in direct sunlight. This orange painter’s tape is idea for masking a variety of surfaces when you are wanting to use gloss or satin based paints. Ideal for painting skirting boards, architraves, frames and doors.

productname: FrogTape® For Gloss & Satin 36mm x 41.1m
productdescription: Get crisp, clean lines on your next painting project with FrogTape® for Gloss & Satin Painter’s Tape. How does it work? It’s made with exclusive PaintBlock® Technology, a super-absorbent polymer that reacts with predominantly water and oil based paints and instantly gels to form a micro-barrier that seals the edges of the tape to prevent paint bleed. The result is a crisp, professional paint line.

productname: Duck Tape double sided tape 38mm x 5m White
productdescription: Duck Tape is tough, strong, waterproof, seals, reinforces, bundles and protects. Perfect for fixing, binding & repairing.

productname: FrogTape® Delicate Surface 36 mm x 41.1m
productdescription: Get crisp, clean lines on your next painting project with FrogTape® Delicate Surface Painter’s Tape. How does it work? It’s made with exclusive PaintBlock® Technology, a super-absorbent polymer that reacts with the water in emulsion paint and instantly gels to form a micro-barrier that seals the edges of the tape to prevent paint bleed. The result is a crisp, professional paint line. Specifically designed to work on delicate surfaces such as fresh paint, wallpaper and decorative projects, this premium grade masking tape is perfect for when you need a lower adhesion level to help prevent surface damage.

productname: Hippo Carpet Protector 80cm x 50m
productdescription:
This is a transparent, non-porous and low slip carpet protector for safeguarding carpets from damage during periods of decorating, renovation and building work.

Unlike most other types of carpet protector, our special water-based adhesive allows it to be used on all types of carpet, including those made from natural fibers like wool.

No special applicator is required. Instead, rolls are reverse wound which means they can be simply dropped in place and quickly kicked out to unroll.

Hippo High-Performance Carpet Protector is certified fire retardant and meets UK fire regulations. This means that it can be left down in commercial buildings for up to 30 days.

Perma-White® mould resistant interior paint contains a biocode that protects the dried coating against fungal degradation*. The paint film is designed to resist cracking, peeling and blistering for up to 7 years before first maintenance.

Perma-White® bonds to existing solvent-based or glossy paints. Perma-White® also seals flat paint, new drywall, cement block and concrete. It is ideally suited for any area of persistent high humidity, frequent temperature changes and poor air circulation.

Perma-White® Interior Matt Paint - Recommended for application in high-humidity areas where a durable, low sheen finish is desired such as finished basements and kitchen

productname: JG Speedfit 15mm x 25m Layflat polybutylene pipe coil
productdescription: Speedfit Layflat Polybutylene barrier pipe has even greater flexibility making the system very easy to handle and worry free. Flexibility – The pipe is ideal for long runs where a softer pipe material is an advantage so cabling through joists becomes a simple task. Easier to handle – When removed from the coil, the pipe keeps straight and ‘lays flat’ meaning there are no issues with the pipe retaining its memory and trying to coil back into place. barrier Layer – The pipe is made of 5 layers, the center of which is a coloured oxygen barrier which prevents the ingress of air into the system, reducing the effect of corrosion on metal components.

productname: JG Speedfit PEX barrier pipe length 15mm x 3m
productdescription: Speedfit lengths of barrier pipe are rigid making them easy to handle on site. Manufactured in the UK by John Guest Speedfit. The pipe is ideal for short runs where a harder pipe material is an advantage. The pipe is made of 5 layers, the center of which is a blue coloured oxygen barrier which prevents the ingress of air into the system, reducing the effect of corrosion on metal components. Due to its low thermal conductivity, when carrying hot water, Speedfit Pipe is cooler and therefore safer to touch. Note: JG Speedfit pipe inserts must be used.

productname: Hep2O 15mm x 3m Barrier Pipe Length Push-Fit
productdescription: This tamper proof straight barrier pipe from Hep2O comes with a HepKey system for easy demounting, and colour coded packaging for ease of identification. Made from polybutylene material, it offers a robust and ultra flexible installation through joists and beams. Featuring In4Sure joint recognition and SmartSleeve that stays captive in the pipe, this barrier pipe offers a secure and leak-proof alternative to the traditional copper pipes

productname: JG Speedfit 90° Equal Elbow Elbow 15mm
productdescription: Speedfit push-fit plastic fitting for the connection of plastic and copper pipe. Simply push the fitting fully onto the pipe and twist the plastic nut clockwise to lock in place. Should the need arise to demount the connection unlock the nut and push the collet towards the body of the fitting and pull the pipe to release. The fitting ensures an easier working environment in confined places and removes the need for hot works on site. Installation can be reduced by around 40% against traditional fixing methods. Note: with all plastic pipes the relevant manufacturer’s pipe insert is required. Designed, manufactured and assembled in the UK by John Guest Speedfit.

productname: Hep2O HD5/10W 90° Equal Elbow 10mm
productdescription:
10mm 90° Equal Elbow for Hep2O push-fit plumbing. 
Hep2O is not just designed to perform, it’s built to last which is why it comes with a 50 year guarantee (twice as long as anyone else). The slim and sleek push-fit plumbing fittings work with both plastic and copper pipe and are ideal for a range of hot and cold water, and heating applications. Easy to install and with proven performance, Hep2o is the primary solution for central heating systems and hot and cold water services.

productname: Hep2O 90° Equal Elbow 15mm

productname: JG Speedfit stop end 15mm
productdescription: Speedfit push-fit fitting for the connection of plastic and copper pipe. A must for any tool bag! The unique feature of the Speedfit concept, the ability to disconnect the fitting at will, means the Stop End provides a leak proof seal and can be removed at any stage in order to allow work to restart or allow an extension to the system. This makes the fitting the perfect tool for when water needs to be turned on, overnight for instance, or if a job suffers an interruption. Stop ends are also useful when pressure testing a system before appliances are connected. Simply push the fitting fully onto the pipe. Should the need arise to demount the connection push the collet toward the body of the fitting and pull the pipe to release. Designed, manufactured and assembled in the UK by John Guest Speedfit.
